title: Coronavirus: Canada's response hits a turning point
description: As response to COVID-19 moves from a learning phase to an operational phase, lessons from the 2009 H1N1 pandemic can inform Canada's action plan.
content: A health care worker prepares for the opening of the COVID Assessment Centre in Ottawa during a media tour on March THE CANADIAN PRESS Justin Tang COVID is an emerging risk for which the consequences are still unknown That the virus could chars
